Falmor Duguir was a reader of the Baldurs Mouth Gazette broadsheet from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
In the , Falmor Duguir came across an issue of Baldurs Mouth Gazette on his recently passed uncles desk. The issues puzzle section titled "Win a Peek at Candlekeep" was half finished. Falmor put some time and effort into the puzzle and eventually completed it. He penned a letter for the Puzzle Editor of the Gazette and enclosed the solved puzzle, asking who he would need to talk to claim the prize. Falmor also asked if he were to come to the Baldurs Mouth building in the Lower City, would Ettvard Needle be the person to talk to, as he also had a piece of his mind to give to the Editor-in-Chief.
